sentences.en: A small manufacturing sector inhibits growth in the economy.
sentences.cn: 制造业规模太小有碍经济增长.

sentences.en: At stake are more than 20,000 jobs in Britain's aerospace sector.
sentences.cn: 英国航天部门2万多人面临失业的危险。

sentences.en: It has been largely through the voluntary sector that the needs of victims have been met.
sentences.cn: 受害者的需要主要是通过志愿组织予以满足的。

sentences.en: It is the largest ever private foreign investment in the Bolivian mining sector.
sentences.cn: 这是玻利维亚矿业史上最大的一次来自国外的私人投资。

sentences.en: Policemen, bankers and butchers are all lumped together in the service sector.
sentences.cn: 警察、银行家和卖肉的全被一股脑儿地并在了服务行业里。

sentences.en: Public sector pay is also in line to be hit hard.
sentences.cn: 公共部门的薪资也很可能受到重创。

sentences.en: The effect of this has been to increasingly marginalize the local authority sector.
sentences.cn: 这件事的影响是使地方当局越来越受到排斥。

sentences.en: The enemy have attacked the British sector.
The news from Body Shop rattled the rest of the retail sector.
sentences.cn: 从“美体小铺”传来的消息令整个零售行业不安。

sentences.en: The news gave a fillip to the telecommunications sector.
sentences.cn: 这个消息给电信部门注入了一针强心剂。

sentences.en: The private sector, by contrast, has plenty of money to spend.
sentences.cn: 相比之下，私营部门就有很多钱可供开销。

sentences.en: The sector dam broke and its water drowned the entire valley.
sentences.cn: 扇形水坝倒塌了,水淹没了整个山谷.

sentences.en: The staff are forbidden to tender for private-sector work.
sentences.cn: 工作人员不得投标承接私营部门的工作。

sentences.en: This is a double wham-my for public sector workers.
sentences.cn: 对于公共部门的工作人员而言可谓祸不单行。

words.tran_cn: 被切割成片；被分成部分
把…分段；将…切片；对…进行划分
部门；扇形，扇区；象限仪；函数尺

phrases.tran_cn: n. 引导扇区；启动磁区
国营部门经济；政府资助的企事业；社会经济的公有部份
服务部门，服务行业；服务业
第三产业（服务业）；第三产业部门

trans.tran_cn: 部门，领域，防御地区，扇形
trans.tran_en: a part of an area of activity, especially of business, trade etc
